elements.name: Submit draft idea and check it can be editted and deleted

steps.name: I want to open browser
I want to maximize window
I want to go to OOB
I want to verify I'm in OOB main page
I want to go to ideas list page
I want to click on Add New button
I want to fill idea name field
I want to select expected start date
I want to select expected end date
I want to fill idea objective field
I want to fill expected budget field
I want to fill Notes field
I want to click save idea button
I want to wait for page load
I want to go to ideas list page

steps.name: I want to search for idea by idea name
I want to click on edit idea icon
I want to click send idea button
I want to verify idea added successfuly
I want to verify submitted idea cannot be deleted or edited
I want to check submitted idea status is In Progress
I want to check submitted idea sent to PMO office for approval
I want to close browser

name: Submit draft idea and check it can be editted and deleted
description: I want to submit draft idea and check it can be editted and deleted then send it
